# onyx-solana

On-chain Solana program for Onyx privacy pool.

## Features

- Privacy pool state management
- Groth16 proof verification on-chain
- Merkle tree tracking
- Nullifier-based double-spend prevention
- Multi-asset support (SOL + SPL tokens)

## Program ID

`6p1tzefXSST8j72qcj5EU3pAcY5qSc3HnCfFqc2gWxjM`

## Development

Build:

```bash
anchor build
```

Test:

```bash
anchor test
```

Deploy:

```bash
anchor deploy
```
